name: fusing-angular
description: Angular Universal seed project featuring Server-Side Rendering, @fuse-box bundling, Jest, Nightmare, Auth0, and more

NODE_MODULES_CACHE.description: Set to true if you wish for Heroku to cache the NPM modules.

NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION.description: This value must be false if you are using heroku to build AND deploy. Build will fail becuase devDependencies will not be downloaded unless this is set to false.

NEW_RELIC_APP_NAME.description: Give this an application name to track in New Relic APM

NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE.description: Setting this to true means new relic is configured via environment variables

PWA_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: Refresh interval for updating the angular PWA manifest
